reviewText: Decent enough yoga dvd, good exercises, but low quality production kind of takes away from the value of the purchase. Looks like it was filmed in his own flat.

This video was produced terribly. Was it done on a cell phone?
There was no step by step demonstrations or explanations, just a single camera
showing Jake doing his 1 hour routine.
The audio was bad, you could barely hear what he was saying.
Very poorly done, I wish I could return it for credit or a refund, but I'm sure that's
not an option.

I am new to yoga and I really enjoyed this DVD. It is clear and easy to follow and fits in well with my weekly workout routine. I can see myself watching and practicing the routine over and over again. I have recommened this to a few of my workout friends and they have also have enjoyed using it. Highly recommended!
